alert.note: Alert for Adams; Brown; Clermont; Clinton; Highland; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:18PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF MASON, ROBERTSON, NORTHWESTERN LEWIS, EASTERN BRACKEN, NORTHEASTERN CLERMONT, BROWN, SOUTHEASTERN WARREN, WESTERN ADAMS, SOUTHERN CLINTON AND HIGHLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM EDT... At 518 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Blanchester to 7 miles northwest of Fairview, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Maysville, Hillsboro, Georgetown, Blanchester, Washington, Mount Orab, West Union, Williamsburg, Manchester, Ripley, Aberdeen, Lynchburg, Leesburg, New Vienna, Augusta, Winchester, Sardinia, Seaman, Lewisburg and Belfast. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Brown; Clermont; Clinton; Highland; Warren
